description: Review and provide feedback on the latest code changes in the repository.
Create slides for the upcoming project presentation.
Join the team meeting to discuss project progress and challenges.
Address and fix reported bugs in the application.
Develop and implement unit tests for critical parts of the codebase.
Explore and gather information on emerging technologies relevant to the project.
Ensure that project documentation is up-to-date with the latest changes.
Refactor and improve the maintainability of existing code.
